name: Bulbasaur
clues: This Pokémon has a plant bulb on its back that grows with it.
It is known to be both Grass and Poison type.
The first Pokémon listed in the National Pokédex.

name: Ivysaur
clues: The bulb on its back blooms into a large flower as it evolves.
It evolves from Bulbasaur.
A Grass/Poison-type Pokémon that is the second stage in its evolutionary line.

name: Venusaur
clues: This Pokémon has a large flower on its back that absorbs sunlight.
It is the final evolution of Bulbasaur.
A dual-type Grass/Poison Pokémon known for its powerful SolarBeam attack.

name: Charmander
clues: This Pokémon has a flame at the tip of its tail that indicates its health.
It is a Fire-type starter Pokémon from the Kanto region.
Ash Ketchum's first Fire-type Pokémon companion.

name: Charmeleon
clues: This Pokémon has a more aggressive nature than its pre-evolution.
It evolves from Charmander.
A Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery tail and sharp claws.

name: Charizard
clues: This Pokémon has wings and can fly, despite its pre-evolutions being unable to.
It evolves from Charmeleon.
A Fire/Flying-type Pokémon resembling a dragon, evolved from Charmander.

name: Squirtle
clues: This Pokémon withdraws into its shell to protect itself.
It is a Water-type starter Pokémon from the Kanto region.
A small turtle-like Pokémon known for its Water Gun attack.

name: Wartortle
clues: This Pokémon has furry ears and a fluffy tail.
It evolves from Squirtle.
A Water-type Pokémon that is the second stage in its evolutionary line.

name: Blastoise
clues: This Pokémon has water cannons on its shell.
It is the final evolution of Squirtle.
A Water-type Pokémon known for its powerful Hydro Pump attack.

name: Caterpie
clues: This Pokémon releases a stench from its antenna to repel enemies.
It is a Bug-type Pokémon that evolves quickly.
A small green caterpillar Pokémon known for its quick evolution into Metapod.

name: Metapod
clues: This Pokémon stays motionless most of the time to conserve energy for evolution.
It evolves from Caterpie.
A cocoon-like Bug-type Pokémon known for using Harden.

name: Butterfree
clues: Its wings are covered in toxic dust.
It is the final evolution of Caterpie.
A butterfly-like Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for Sleep Powder and Gust.

name: Weedle
clues: This Pokémon has a poisonous stinger on its head.
It is often found in forests and grassy areas.
A Bug/Poison-type Pokémon resembling a worm or larva.

name: Kakuna
clues: It remains motionless as it prepares to evolve.
It evolves from Weedle.
A cocoon-like Bug/Poison-type Pokémon that mainly uses Harden.

name: Beedrill
clues: This Pokémon attacks in swarms using its twin needle arms.
It is the final evolution of Weedle.
A wasp-like Bug/Poison-type Pokémon with powerful Fury Attack.

name: Pidgey
clues: This Pokémon uses its wings to kick up dust and escape enemies.
It is a common sight in the early stages of many games.
A small Normal/Flying-type bird Pokémon.

name: Pidgeotto
clues: It claims a large territory for itself.
It evolves from Pidgey.
A Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for Gust and Quick Attack.

name: Pidgeot
clues: This Pokémon can fly at Mach 2 speed.
It is the final evolution of Pidgey.
A majestic bird-like Normal/Flying-type Pokémon with large wings.

name: Rattata
clues: It constantly gnaws on things to keep its teeth sharp.
It is often found early in the game and is quite fast.
A small purple Normal-type rodent Pokémon.

name: Raticate
clues: It has extremely sharp fangs that can chew through concrete.
It evolves from Rattata.
A large rat-like Normal-type Pokémon with aggressive nature.

name: Spearow
clues: It has a loud cry that can be heard over long distances.
A Normal/Flying-type bird Pokémon with a fierce personality.
A small bird Pokémon known for its aggressive pecking.

name: Fearow
clues: This Pokémon has a long neck and beak, ideal for catching prey.
It is the evolved form of Spearow.
A large avian Pokémon that flies swiftly and strikes with its sharp beak.

name: Ekans
clues: This snake-like Pokémon can unhinge its jaw to swallow large prey.
It is a Poison-type Pokémon that slithers silently.
Its name is 'snake' spelled backwards.

name: Arbok
clues: Its hood has intimidating patterns to scare opponents.
It evolves from Ekans.
A cobra-like Poison-type Pokémon known for its fierce gaze and constriction.

name: Pikachu
clues: It releases electric discharges when threatened or excited.
Ash Ketchum's first and most iconic Pokémon partner.
A small yellow Electric-type Pokémon known for its red cheeks and lightning bolt-shaped tail.

name: Nidoran♀
clues: This small Pokémon has toxic barbs used in self-defense.
It is exclusively female and known for its gentle temperament.
A Poison-type Pokémon that evolves into Nidorina.

name: Nidorina
clues: It is more cautious than its pre-evolution and avoids battle.
It evolves from Nidoran♀.
A Poison-type Pokémon that doesn’t develop horns like its male counterpart.

name: Nidoqueen
clues: Its tough scales cover its body like armor.
It evolves from Nidorina when exposed to a Moon Stone.
A Ground/Poison-type known for being a defensive powerhouse.

name: Nidoran♂
clues: It has larger ears and more developed horns than its female counterpart.
It is exclusively male and releases poison from its horn.
A Poison-type Pokémon that evolves into Nidorino.

name: Nidorino
clues: This Pokémon is more aggressive than Nidoran♂.
It evolves from Nidoran♂.
A Poison-type known for using Horn Attack and Poison Sting.

name: Nidoking
clues: Its tail is so strong it can smash buildings.
It evolves from Nidorino using a Moon Stone.
A Ground/Poison-type with immense attack power and a fierce horn.

name: Clefairy
clues: This Pokémon is said to dance under the full moon.
It is known for its cute appearance and healing moves.
A Fairy-type Pokémon often seen with the Moon Stone.

name: Clefable
clues: It is very shy and rarely seen by humans.
It evolves from Clefairy using a Moon Stone.
A Fairy-type Pokémon with wings and a peaceful nature.

name: Vulpix
clues: This Pokémon is born with a single white tail that splits as it grows.
It is a Fire-type Pokémon often seen with elegant curls.
A fox-like Pokémon known for its six warm tails.

name: Ninetales
clues: It is said to live for 1,000 years.
It evolves from Vulpix using a Fire Stone.
A majestic Fire-type Pokémon with nine flowing tails.

name: Jigglypuff
clues: This Pokémon uses its song to put others to sleep.
Its round body is filled with air like a balloon.
A Fairy-type Pokémon with a famous singing ability.

name: Wigglytuff
clues: Its body is so soft, people can’t stop hugging it.
It evolves from Jigglypuff using a Moon Stone.
A Fairy-type Pokémon that resembles an inflated balloon.

name: Zubat
clues: This Pokémon has no eyes and relies on echolocation.
It is commonly found in caves.
A Poison/Flying-type bat Pokémon with high speed.

name: Golbat
clues: This Pokémon drains the blood of its prey.
It evolves from Zubat at level 22.
A large bat-like Poison/Flying-type Pokémon.

name: Oddish
clues: It buries itself during the day to avoid sunlight.
It is both Grass and Poison type.
A small blue root Pokémon with leaves on its head.

name: Gloom
clues: It emits a foul odor from the flower on its head.
It evolves from Oddish at level 21.
A drooling Grass/Poison-type Pokémon.

name: Vileplume
clues: Its petals are the largest in the Pokémon world.
It evolves from Gloom using a Leaf Stone.
A Grass/Poison-type Pokémon with a giant red flower.

name: Paras
clues: It has mushrooms growing on its back.
It’s a Bug/Grass-type Pokémon that lives in forests.
A crab-like Pokémon often associated with spores.

name: Parasect
clues: The mushroom has taken full control of its host.
It evolves from Paras at level 24.
A Bug/Grass-type Pokémon with a zombified appearance.

name: Venonat
clues: Its eyes act as radar to detect its surroundings.
It’s a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon covered in fur.
A purple fuzzy Pokémon that evolves into Venomoth.

name: Venomoth
clues: It scatters powdery scales that can cause paralysis.
It evolves from Venonat at level 31.
A moth-like Bug/Poison-type Pokémon with fluttering wings.

name: Pinsir
clues: This Pokémon uses its massive horns to grip and squeeze foes.
It is a pure Bug-type Pokémon without any evolutions in Generation I.
It resembles a large brown stag beetle.

name: Tauros
clues: It whips itself into a frenzy using its three tails.
This Pokémon is exclusive to the Safari Zone in Generation I.
A bull-like Normal-type Pokémon known for its aggressive nature.

name: Magikarp
clues: This Pokémon is known for being very weak and only knowing Splash.
It is commonly seen as useless until it evolves.
A floppy orange fish Pokémon that becomes the mighty Gyarados.

name: Gyarados
clues: This Pokémon evolves from one of the weakest Pokémon.
Its fierce temper and destructive power are legendary.
A large serpentine Water/Flying-type Pokémon known for Hyper Beam.

name: Lapras
clues: This Pokémon is often used to ferry people across water.
It is an Ice/Water-type Pokémon with a gentle nature.
A plesiosaur-like Pokémon known for its intelligence and rarity.

name: Ditto
clues: This Pokémon can transform into any other Pokémon it sees.
It is a single-stage Normal-type Pokémon.
A purple blob-like Pokémon known for its Transform ability.

name: Eevee
clues: This Pokémon has unstable genetic makeup, allowing for multiple evolutions.
It can evolve into one of several different types.
A cute Normal-type Pokémon with many evolutionary possibilities.

name: Vaporeon
clues: It has fins and can melt into water to become invisible.
One of Eevee's Water-type evolutions.
A mermaid-like Pokémon with a finned tail and aquatic features.

name: Jolteon
clues: This Pokémon stores electricity in its body hairs.
It evolves from Eevee using a Thunder Stone.
A spiky yellow Electric-type Pokémon known for its speed.

name: Flareon
clues: This Pokémon stores thermal energy in its body.
It evolves from Eevee using a Fire Stone.
A fluffy red-orange Fire-type Pokémon with a high Attack stat.

name: Porygon
clues: This Pokémon was created entirely out of programming code.
It is a digital Pokémon that can convert itself into data.
A virtual polygonal Normal-type Pokémon resembling 3D shapes.

name: Omanyte
clues: This extinct Pokémon was resurrected from a Helix Fossil.
It is a Rock/Water-type resembling a shelled ammonite.
A spiral-shelled ancient Pokémon with tentacles.

name: Omastar
clues: It uses its tentacles to ensnare prey.
Evolves from Omanyte.
A spiny-shelled Rock/Water-type Pokémon with a fierce bite.

name: Kabuto
clues: It is a fossil Pokémon restored from the Dome Fossil.
It has a hard shell and scuttles along the seafloor.
A small, ancient Rock/Water-type Pokémon resembling a trilobite.

name: Kabutops
clues: Its sharp scythes are used to cut down prey.
It evolves from Kabuto.
A sleek, bipedal Rock/Water-type Pokémon with blade-like arms.

name: Aerodactyl
clues: This prehistoric Pokémon was restored from Old Amber.
It flies at high speed and has a fearsome screech.
A Rock/Flying-type Pokémon resembling a pterosaur.

name: Snorlax
clues: This Pokémon only wakes up to eat over 800 pounds of food.
It blocks paths by sleeping in inconvenient locations.
A large, sleepy Normal-type Pokémon known for Rest and Body Slam.

name: Articuno
clues: This Legendary Bird Pokémon appears with snowstorms.
It is the embodiment of ice and cold winds.
An Ice/Flying-type Legendary Pokémon with majestic blue wings.

name: Zapdos
clues: This Legendary Pokémon controls thunder and lightning.
It lives in storm clouds and crackles with electricity.
An Electric/Flying-type Legendary Bird Pokémon with spiky feathers.

name: Moltres
clues: This Legendary Bird brings spring with its fiery presence.
Its body is cloaked in flames.
A Fire/Flying-type Legendary Pokémon with blazing wings.

name: Dratini
clues: This elusive Pokémon lives in deep oceans and rivers.
It constantly sheds its skin as it grows.
A serpentine Dragon-type Pokémon that evolves into Dragonair.

name: Dragonair
clues: This elegant Pokémon emits a mystical aura.
It evolves from Dratini.
A long, blue Dragon-type Pokémon with orbs on its tail and neck.

name: Dragonite
clues: Despite its bulky frame, it can fly at the speed of sound.
It evolves from Dragonair.
A friendly Dragon/Flying-type Pokémon that resembles a chubby dragon.

name: Mewtwo
clues: It was created through genetic manipulation from a mythical Pokémon.
One of the most powerful Psychic-type Pokémon.
A Legendary Pokémon with telekinetic powers, cloned from Mew.

name: Mew
clues: It contains the DNA of all Pokémon.
It is extremely rare and was once thought to be extinct.
A small pink Psychic-type Mythical Pokémon known for its versatility.
